ProductCategoryDisqual.name: ProductCategoryDisqual
ProductCategoryDisqual.description: Represents disqualification rules for product categories. The rules determine when the product category doesnâ€™t qualify to be displayed to users.

CategoryId.description: The product category associated with the product disqualification record.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from which the disqualification rule for the product category comes into effect.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date to which the disqualification rule for the product category ceases to be in effect.

IsDisqualified.description: Indicates whether the product category is disqualified (true) or not (false) based on the disqualification rules.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product category disqualification record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product category disqualification record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product category disqualification record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the product category disqualification record.

Reason.description: The reason to disqualify the product category.

ProductCategoryDisqual.accessRules: Product Catalog Management must be enabled to access this object.
